obs.ontologyAccess
Class BioPortalAccessTool

java.lang.Object
  obs.ontologyAccess.AbstractOntologyAccessTool
      obs.ontologyAccess.BioPortalAccessTool
All Implemented Interfaces:
OntologyAccess
public class BioPortalAccessTool
extends AbstractOntologyAccessTool

This class is used to access BioPortal ontologies. This tool works with BioPortal 2.0 release. Other versions have not been tested. See also OntologyAccess, AbstractOntologyAccessTool. ParametersBean to connect to BioPortal REST services must be an URL such as: "http://ncbo-core-stage1:8080/bioportal/rest/"

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clement Jonquet

 LightConceptBeanList mapStringToLocalConceptBeans(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String localOntologyID, boolean exactMap)
          For a given String, returns the list of concepts in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false; Get the results by hitting the URL: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/software/?ontologyids={bioportal_virtual_ontology_id}&isexactmatch=[0|1] For instance: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/melanoma/?ontologyids=1009&isexactmatch=0 Attention, the results are in the latest version of the given ontology: the given localOntologyId is converted to virtual ontology id and then results are retrieved in that virtual ontology id (i.e., which corresponds to the latest localOntologyId in BioPortal which can be different from the given one).
 java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> mapStringToLocalConceptIDs(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String localOntologyID, boolean exactMap)
          For a given String, returns the set of localConceptIDs in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false; This function uses mapStringToLocalConceptBeans and checks (by using getBioPortalConceptBean) if the results actually exists in the given localOntologyID.

Constructor Detail

BioPortalAccessTool

public BioPortalAccessTool(java.lang.String name)
Constructs a tool to access BioPortal REST services. The new BioPortalAccessTool is constructed with an empty set of ontologies and a randomly generated name.

BioPortalAccessTool

public BioPortalAccessTool(java.lang.String[] localOntologyIDs,
                           java.lang.String name)
                    throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Constructs a tool to access BioPortal REST services and an array of ontologies (i.e., BioPortal URIs) and a customized generated name.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

addAllOntology

public void addAllOntology()
Description copied from class: AbstractOntologyAccessTool
Adds all the possible ontologies in the repository to the set of ontologies accessed by the tool.

Specified by:
addAllOntology in class AbstractOntologyAccessTool

addAllBioPortalOntologies

public void addAllBioPortalOntologies()
Adds all the latest version of the BioPortal ontologies to the tool. The previous versions are not added to the tool.

getConceptSynonyms

public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getConceptSynonyms(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                       throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns a set of String, synonym names of the concept. Returns the union of the synonyms fields of the concept bean. Right now synonyms will use only EXACT SYNONYM, NARROW SYNONYM, BROAD SYNONYM, RELATED SYNONYM and BP_SYNONYM fields.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

isRootConcept

public boolean isRootConcept(java.lang.String localConceptID)

Returns true if the given concept is a root (top level concept) in this ontology. Returns true if the concept is in the result of getRootConcepts.

OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

public java.lang.String getOntologyName(java.lang.String localOntologyID)

Returns the ontology name as defined in the corresponding system for a given ontology. Returns the field displayLabel of the corresponding ontology bean.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getOntologyDescription

public java.lang.String getOntologyDescription(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
                                        throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Returns the ontology description as defined in the corresponding system for a given ontology. Returns a concatenation of different ontology properties (if they exist) from BioPortal: format + oboFoundryId + contactName + contactEmail + homepage + documentation.

Throws:
NullBioPortalOntologyBeanException
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getRootConceptBeans

public LightConceptBeanList getRootConceptBeans(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
                                         throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Returns the a list of concept beans of the ontology root concepts (i.e., concepts without parents). Get the results by hitting the URL: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/rest/concepts/{localOntologyID}/root For instance: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/rest/concepts/38677/root

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getOntologyRootConcepts

public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getOntologyRootConcepts(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
                                                            throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Returns the a set of localConceptID of the ontology root concepts (i.e., concepts without parents).

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

isValidLocalConceptID

public boolean isValidLocalConceptID(java.lang.String localConceptID)
LocalConceptID must match the following regular expression: [\\d]+/.+ For instance: 38378/DOID:1909. This function do check if the ontologyID part of the localConceptID is a valid localOntologyID using isValidLocalOntologyID.

createLocalConceptID

public static java.lang.String createLocalConceptID(java.lang.String localOntologyID,
                                                    java.lang.String bpConceptID)
Creates a localConceptID with a given localOntologyID and a given BPConceptID. LocalConceptID form is: 'localOntologyID/BPConceptID'.

isValidLocalOntologyID

public boolean isValidLocalOntologyID(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
LocalOntologyID must match the following regular expression: [\\d]+ For instance: 32145 or 38378.

mapStringToLocalConceptBeans

public LightConceptBeanList mapStringToLocalConceptBeans(java.lang.String s,
                                                         java.lang.String localOntologyID,
                                                         boolean exactMap)
                                                  throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
For a given String, returns the list of concepts in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false; Get the results by hitting the URL: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/software/?ontologyids={bioportal_virtual_ontology_id}&isexactmatch=[0|1] For instance: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/melanoma/?ontologyids=1009&isexactmatch=0 Attention, the results are in the latest version of the given ontology: the given localOntologyId is converted to virtual ontology id and then results are retrieved in that virtual ontology id (i.e., which corresponds to the latest localOntologyId in BioPortal which can be different from the given one).

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

mapStringToLocalConceptIDs

public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> mapStringToLocalConceptIDs(java.lang.String s,
                                                                      java.lang.String localOntologyID,
                                                                      boolean exactMap)
                                                               throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
For a given String, returns the set of localConceptIDs in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false; This function uses mapStringToLocalConceptBeans and checks (by using getBioPortalConceptBean) if the results actually exists in the given localOntologyID. Longer, but accurate.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getConceptDirectParentBeans

public java.util.ArrayList<BioPortalLightConceptBean> getConceptDirectParentBeans(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                                           throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns the set of concept of all the direct parents.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

getConceptDirectParents

public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getConceptDirectParents(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                            throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns the set of localConceptIDs of all the direct parents. This function does not remove the cycles (i.e. concepts that are parent of themselves).

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

                                                             throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns the set of localConceptIDs of all the direct children. This function does not remove the cycles (i.e. concepts that are child of themselves).

OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
